abstract: NHL Roundup; Columbus Blue Jackets beat New Jersey Devils, 2-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Sergei Bobrovsky made 27 saves to help Columbus top the Devils, 2-1, in Newark.

headline.main: Blue Jackets Goalie Stops Devils Again
headline.print_headline: Blue Jackets Goalie Stops Devils Again

snippet: Sergei Bobrovsky made 27 saves to help Columbus top the Devils, 2-1, in Newark.
